profile.are_you_want_delete: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile.warning_delete_desc: Deleting Your Account Will Permanently Remove All Data
profile.warning_delete_desc_2:
By proceeding with the deletion of your account, you will lose:
All Tokens: Any tokens collected or earned will be permanently deleted.
Gift Card Balance: Your remaining gift card balances will be forfeited and cannot be recovered.
This action is irreversible. Please ensure you have redeemed any tokens or gift cards before continuing.
profile.you_want_exit: Why do you want to exit the application?
